abstract: The Occupy Wall Street protesters have a famous (and wealthy) new fan: Warren E. Buffett's son. In an interview with Bloomberg News, Howard Buffett said he sympathized with concerns over the growing divide between the haves and the have-nots. "There has never been a time in my lifetime when the government is going to cut an incredible amount of programs that support poor people and feed them," he said.
